config:
根据地标编码取地标信息
select LandCode as LandmarkCode, LandName as LandMarkName, LandY as LandY, LandX as LandX from tbLandMark
查询线路线段设置
select distinct * from tbRouteFragmentConfig
查询线路线段设置
select distinct Fragment from tbRouteFragmentConfig
根据动作地标查询命令
select r.*,c.CmdName from tbRouteFragmentConfig r left join tbCmd c on r.CmdCode=c.CmdCode where ActionLandMark='$ActionLandMark$'
删除线路线段
delete from tbRouteFragmentConfig where Fragment='$Fragment$'
查询指令档案
select * from tbCmd
查询指令档案
select * from tbRouteFragmentConfig where Fragment='$Fragment$'
保存线路线段设置
insert into tbRouteFragmentConfig values ('$Fragment$','$ActionLandMark$',$CmdCode$,$CmdPara$,$CmdIndex$)
删除线路线段设置
delete from tbRouteFragmentConfig where Fragment='$Fragment$'
Load_SpeRunDir
查询特殊行走方向设置
select * from tbSpecRunDirConfig
删除特殊行走方向设置
delete from tbSpecRunDirConfig
保存特殊行走方向设置
insert into tbSpecRunDirConfig values('$Fragment$',$Dir$)
删除系统参数
delete from tbSysParamater
保存系统参数
insert into tbSysParamater ( ParameterCode, ParameterValue ) values ( '$ParameterCode$', '$ParameterValue$' )
加载系统参数模板信息
select * from tbSystermModel
根据系统参数编码取系统参数信息
select ParameterCode, ParameterValue from tbSysParamater where ParameterCode='$ParameterCode$'
根据地标编码取地标信息
select LandCode as LandmarkCode, LandName as LandMarkName, LandY as LandY, LandX as LandX from tbLandMark where $Condition$
加载AGV档案
select CarCode as AgvID, CarName as CarName, CarIP, CarPort, StandbyLandMark from tbCar
删除AGV档案
delete from tbCar
保存AGV档案
insert into tbCar ( CarCode, CarName, CarIP, CarPort, StandbyLandMark ) values ( $CarCode$, '$CarName$', '$CarIP$', '$CarPort$', '$StandbyLandMark$' )
删除动作
delete from tbCmd
保存动作编码
insert into tbCmd ( CmdCode, CmdName, CmdOrder ) values ( '$ActionCode$', '$ActionName$', '$ActionOrder$' );
加载所有动作
select CmdCode, CmdName, CmdOrder from tbCmd
删除所有的交管信息
delete from tbLandmarkResList
删除所有的区域车辆信息
delete from tbTraJunction
加载所有的交管信息
select * from tbLandmarkResList
加载所有的区域车辆信息
select * from tbTraJunction
保存所有的交管信息
insert into tbLandmarkResList ( ID, Description, LandMarkList ) values ( $ID$, '$Description$', '$LandMarkList$' )
保存所有的区域车辆信息
insert into tbTraJunction ( TraJunctionID, Carnumber, JunctionLandMarkCodes ) values ( $TraJunctionID$, $Carnumber$, '$JunctionLandMarkCodes$' )
删除布局设置表
delete from tbPlanset where fileName='$fileName$'
获取新的地图ID
select max(ID)+1 from tbPlanset
删除地标档案
delete from tbLandMark
保存地标档案
insert into tbLandMark ( LandCode, LandName, LandY, LandX ) values $Value_Sql$
删除储位档案
delete from tbLocaton where ID not in ($DelStockConditon$)
保存储位档案
$Value_Sql$
删除全局线段表
delete from tbAllSegment
保存全局线段表
insert into tbAllSegment (BeginLandMakCode, EndLandMarkCode, Length,ExcuteAngle, ExcuteMoveDirect, ExcuteTurnDirect, SegmentType, Point1X, Point1Y, Point2X, Point2Y, Point3X, Point3Y, Point4X, Point4Y, PlanRouteLevel, ExcuteAvoidance, ExcuteSpeed ) values $Value_Sql$
加载AGV坐标体系设置
select * from tbAGVCoordinate
保存AGV坐标体系设置
delete from tbAGVCoordinate
保存AGV坐标体系设置
insert into tbAGVCoordinate ( Direction, Angle ) values ( $Direction$, $Angle$ )
加载所有操作按钮
select * from tbSysOperButton
查询用户分类
select * from tbUserCategory
查询所有用户分类权限按钮档案
select * from tbUserCategoryToButton
删除用户分类按钮对照
delete from tbUserCategoryToButton where CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$'
保存所分配的权限
insert into tbUserCategoryToButton ( ButtonName, ButtonType, CategoryCode )values ( '$ButtonName$', $ButtonType$, '$CategoryCode$')
根据用户分类编码查询系统按钮
select b.ButtonType, b.ButtonName, b.ButtonCaption, t.CategoryCode from tbSysOperButton b inner join tbUserCategoryToButton t on b.ButtonName=t.ButtonName where t.CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$'
根据分类编码查询用户
select a.* from tbUser a inner join tbUserToCategory b on a.UserID=b.UserID where b.CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$'
删除用户分类
delete from tbUserCategory where CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$';
delete from tbUser where UserID in (select UserID from tbUserToCategory t where t.CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$');
delete from tbUserToCategory where CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$';
delete from tbUserCategoryToButton where CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$'
删除用户
delete from tbUser where UserID='$UserID$';
删除用户
delete from tbUserToCategory where UserID='$UserID$'
保存用户分类
insert into tbUserCategory (CategoryCode, CategoryName) values ( '$CategoryCode$', '$CategoryName$' )
查询最后一条用户分类编码
select top 1 CategoryCode from tbUserCategory order by CategoryCode desc
根据用户ID删除用户分类对照
delete from tbUserToCategory where UserID='$UserID$'
保存用户分类对照
insert into tbUserToCategory (CategoryCode, UserID) values ('$CategoryCode$', '$UserID$' )
保存用户
insert into tbUser ( UserID, PassWord, UserName ) values ( '$UserID$', '$PassWord$', '$UserName$' )
查询最后一条用户ID
select top 1 UserID from tbUser order by UserID desc
查询所有线路
select RouteCode as RouteID, RouteName as RouteName, LandMarks as LandCodeStr, RouteWorkType as RouteTypeInt, StationNo, DirectionForStation from tbRoute
删除单条线路
delete from tbRoute where RouteCode=$RouteCode$; delete from tbRouteToSegmentRes where RouteID=$RouteCode$; delete from tbRouteToAgvRoute where RouteID=$RouteCode$; delete from tbRouteLandMarkCmdList where RouteID=$RouteCode$; delete from tbRoutePoint where RouteCode=$RouteCode$;
查询所有线路
select RouteCode as RouteID, RouteName as RouteName, LandMarks as LandCodeStr, RouteWorkType as RouteTypeInt, StationNo, DirectionForStation from tbRoute where RouteCode=$TaskID$
查询线路对照AGV
select c.CarCode as AgvID, c.CarName as CarName, c.CarType as CarType, c.CarIP, c.CarPort, ra.CarRouteID as OnCarRouteID from tbRoute r inner join tbRouteToAgvRoute ra on r.RouteCode=ra.RouteID inner join tbCar c on ra.CarCode= c.CarCode where r.RouteCode=$RouteCode$
删除单条线路
delete from tbRoute where RouteCode=$RouteCode$; delete from tbRouteToSegmentRes where RouteID=$RouteCode$; delete from tbRouteToAgvRoute where RouteID=$RouteCode$;
保存线路
insert into tbRoute ( RouteCode, RouteName, LandMarks, RouteWorkType, StationNo, DirectionForStation ) values ( $RouteCode$, '$RouteName$', '$LandMarks$', $RouteWorkType$, $StationNo$, $DirectionForStation$ )
保存线路属性
insert into tbRoutePoint ( RouteCode, LandCode, Area, IsWaitArea ) select $RouteCode$ as RouteCode, LandCode, Area, IsWaitArea from tbRoutePoint where RouteCode=$OrialRouteCode$
保存线路动作
insert into tbRouteLandMarkCmdList ( RouteID, CmdCode, LandMarkCode, CmdIndex, DelayTime, CmdPara ) select $RouteCode$ as RouteID, CmdCode, LandMarkCode, CmdIndex, DelayTime, CmdPara from tbRouteLandMarkCmdList where RouteID=$OrialRouteCode$
取线段最大值
select coalesce(max(SegmentResID),1) SegmentResID from tbSegmentRes
根据起止地标取线段
select SegmentResID from tbSegmentRes where StartLandmark=$StartLandMarkID$ and EndLandmark=$EndLandMarkID$
保存线路对应的线段
insert into tbSegmentRes ( SegmentResID, StartLandmark, EndLandmark ) values ( $SegmentResID$, $StartLandMarkID$, $EndLandMarkID$ )
保存线路对应的线段
insert into tbRouteToSegmentRes ( RouteID, SegmentResID, DirID ) values ( $RouteCode$, $SegmentResID$, $DirID$ )
保存线路对照AGV
insert into tbRouteToAgvRoute ( RouteID, CarCode, CarRouteID ) values ( $RouteCode$, $CarCode$, $CarRouteID$ )
加载用户信息
select UserID, PassWord, UserName from tbUser where UserID='$UserID$' and PassWord='$PassWord$'
查询报表信息表
select QueryCode, QueryName, sqlStr from tbDetailQuery
查询报表条件表
select QueryCode, ConditionCode, ConditionName, ConditionValue, control_type, X, Y from tbDetailCondition where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'
获取报表字段信息
select QueryCode, FiledCode, FiledName, SummaryType from tbDetailQueryFiled where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'
根据编码查询报表信息表
select QueryCode, QueryName, sqlStr from tbDetailQuery where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'
获取报表字段信息
select QueryCode, FiledCode, FiledName, SummaryType from tbDetailQueryFiled where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'
执行报表查询sql
$sql$
删除报表
delete from tbDetailCondition where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'; delete from tbDetailQueryFiled where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'; delete from tbDetailQuery where QueryCode='$QueryCode$';
保存明细查询表
insert into tbDetailQuery ( QueryCode, QueryName, sqlStr ) values ( '$QueryCode$', '$QueryName$', '$sqlStr$' );
保存明细查询条件表
insert into tbDetailCondition ( QueryCode, ConditionCode, ConditionName, ConditionValue, control_type, X, Y ) values ( '$QueryCode$', '$ConditionCode$', '$ConditionName$', '$ConditionValue$', $control_type$, $X$, $Y$ );
保存报表字段
insert into tbDetailQueryFiled ( QueryCode, FiledCode, FiledName, SummaryType ) values ( '$QueryCode$', '$FiledCode$', '$FiledName$', $SummaryType$ );
加载区域档案
select * from tbAreaInfo
删除所有的区域信息
delete from tbAreaInfo
保存所有的区域信息
insert into tbAreaInfo ( OwnArea, AreaName ) values ( $OwnArea$, '$AreaName$' )
加载区域档案
select * from tbMaterialInfo
删除所有的区域信息
delete from tbMaterialInfo
保存所有的区域信息
insert into tbMaterialInfo ( MaterialType, MaterialName ) values ( $MaterialType$, '$MaterialName$' )
加载区域档案
select * from tbActionInfo
删除所有的区域信息
delete from tbActionInfo
保存所有的区域信息
insert into tbActionInfo ( ActionID, ActionName, WaitTime, CommondText ) values ( $ActionID$, '$ActionName$', $WaitTime$, '$CommondText$' )
加载所有的呼叫盒信息
select * from tbCallBoxInfo
删除呼叫盒
delete from tbCallBoxInfo where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$; delete from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$;
删除呼叫盒地标信息
delete from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$;
保存呼叫盒
delete from tbCallBoxInfo where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$; insert into tbCallBoxInfo ( CallBoxID, CallBoxName ) values ( $CallBoxID$, '$CallBoxName$' );
保存呼叫盒明细
delete from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$ and ButtonID=$ButtonID$; insert into tbCallBoxDetail ( CallBoxID, ButtonID, TaskConditonCode, OperaType, LocationID, LocationState ) values ( $CallBoxID$, $ButtonID$, '$TaskConditonCode$', $OperaType$, $LocationID$, $LocationState$ );
加载所有的任务条件配置信息
select distinct * from tbTaskConfigInfo
加载任务条件必经地标信息
select * from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and TaskConfigDetailID=$TaskConfigDetailID$ order by DetailID asc
加载任务条件地标相应动作信息
select a.*,coalesce(b.ActionName,'') ActionName,b.IsPass,b.IsWait,b.DeviceID,b.TerminalType, b.TerminalID,coalesce(b.TerminalData,'') TerminalData,b.WaitTime,coalesce(c.DeviceName,'') DeviceName from tbTaskMustPassToIOAction a left join tbIOActionInfo b on a.ActionID=b.ActionID left join tbIODeviceInfo c on b.DeviceID=c.ID where a.TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and a.TaskConfigDetailID=$TaskConfigDetailID$ and a.MustPassLandCode='$MustPassLandCode$' order by a.DetailID asc
加载任务条件配置明细
select * from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$'
删除任务条件配置
delete from tbTaskConfigInfo where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$'; delete from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$'; delete from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$';
查询任务配置明细
select * from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$'
加载任务必经地标
select * from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and TaskConfigDetailID=$DetailID$
保存任务配置主表
delete from tbTaskConfigInfo where TaskConditonCode=$TaskConditonCode$; insert into tbTaskConfigInfo ( TaskConditonCode, TaskConditonName ) values ( '$TaskConditonCode$', '$TaskConditonName$' );
删除任务配置明细
delete from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$';
保存任务配置明细
delete from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and DetailID=$DetailID$; insert into tbTaskConfigDetail ( TaskConditonCode, DetailID, ArmOwnArea, StorageState, MaterialType, Action, IsWaitPass ) values ( '$TaskConditonCode$', $DetailID$, $ArmOwnArea$, $StorageState$, $MaterialType$, $Action$, $IsWaitPass$ );
任务条件配置必经地标
delete from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and TaskConfigDetailID=$TaskConfigDetailID$ and DetailID=$DetailID$; insert into tbTaskConfigMustPass ( TaskConditonCode, TaskConfigDetailID, DetailID, MustPassLandCode, Action ) values ( '$TaskConditonCode$', $TaskConfigDetailID$, $DetailID$, '$MustPassLandCode$', $Action$ );
获得所有小车路线关联线段
select BeginLandMakCode, EndLandMarkCode, Length, ExcuteAngle, ExcuteMoveDirect, ExcuteTurnDirect, SegmentType, Point1X, Point1Y, Point2X, Point2Y, Point3X, Point3Y, Point4X, Point4Y from tbAllSegment
获得所有储位
select *,StorageState as PreStorageState from tbLocaton
加载呼叫盒明细
select * from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$
根据ID加载呼叫盒信息
select * from tbCallBoxInfo where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$
判断当前呼叫点是否可以再次呼叫
select count(1) Amount from tbDispatchTaskInfo where stationNo=$CallBoxID$ and CallLand='$CallLand$' and TaskState in(0,1)
添加任务
$sql$
查询系统参数
select A.ParameterCode ParameterCode,case when b.ParameterValue <> 'NULL' then b.ParameterValue else a.DefaultValue end ParameterValue from tbSystermModel a Left join tbSysParamater b On A.ParameterCode =B.ParameterCode
更新任务完成
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskInfo SET TaskState =$State$,FinishTime ='$FinishTime$' where dispatchNo ='$dispatchNo$'
更新任务状态执行
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskInfo SET ExeAgvID ='$ExeAgvID$',TaskState = '$TaskState$',ExeTime='$ExeTime$' where dispatchNo ='$dispatchNo$';
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set State=$TaskState$ where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' and DetailID=$TaskDetialID$;
加载调度任务
select dispatchNo, stationNo, taskType, ExeAgvID, BuildTime, TaskState, FinishTime, ExeTime, CallLand from tbDispatchTaskInfo where (SUBSTRING(BuildTime,1,8) between '$PreDate$' and '$CurrDate$') and TaskState in ($TaskState$) order by BuildTime asc
加载调度任务明细
select * from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' order by DetailID asc
解锁储位状态
UPDATE tbLocaton SET StorageState =$StorageState$ ,LockState = 0 ,LockCar = '' where LankMarkCode='$landmarkcode$'
更新任务明细状态完成
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskInfo set TaskState=1,ExeAgvID=$ExeAgvID$ where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and TaskState=0;
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set State=2 where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' and DetailID=$TaskDetailID$;
更新任务主表状态完成
update tbDispatchTaskInfo set TaskState=2 where 0=( select count(1) Amount from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and State!=2 ) and dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$'
判断任务是否已完成
select * from tbDispatchTaskDetail where dispatchNo='$dispatchNo$' and State in (0,1)
放行
UPDATE tbDispatchTaskDetail set IsAllowExcute=1 where dispatchNo='$TaskNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' and DetailID=( select coalesce(min(DetailID),0) from tbDispatchTaskDetail where IsAllowExcute=0 and dispatchNo='$TaskNo$' and LandCode='$LandCode$' )
更新储位
UPDATE tbLocaton set StorageState=$StorageState$ where ID=$ID$
加载所有io设备类型
SELECT IODeviceType ,IODeviceName FROM tbIODeviceTypeInfo
删除所有类型
DELETE FROM tbIODeviceTypeInfo
插入所有类型
INSERT INTO tbIODeviceTypeInfo(IODeviceType ,IODeviceName) VALUES($IODeviceType$ ,'$IODeviceName$')
加载电梯IO档案
select * from tbIODeviceInfo
根据IOID获得IO配置
select * from tbIODeviceInfo where ID=$ID$ and IODeviceType=$IODeviceType$
删除IO
delete from tbIODeviceDetail where ID=$ID$ and IODeviceType=$IODeviceType$; delete from tbIODeviceInfo where ID=$ID$ and IODeviceType=$IODeviceType$;
插入IO
insert into tbIODeviceInfo (ID,IODeviceType,DeviceName,IP,Port,PackHeader,PackEnd) values ($ID$,$IODeviceType$,'$DeviceName$','$IP$','$Port$','$PackHeader$','$PackEnd$')
插入IO端子
insert into tbIODeviceDetail (ID,IODeviceType,TerminalID,BeginAddress,FunctionCode,DataLenth,Data,Remark) values($itemID$,$itemIODeviceType$,$TerminalID$,'$BeginAddress$','$FunctionCode$',$DataLenth$,'$Data$','$Remark$');
